results.name: wordpress-app/wordpress-5445bc4985-bskbj

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-app/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-5445bc4985-bskbj], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-5445bc4985-bskbj' is not ready. Expected 1 ready pod.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Describe pod for issues: `kubectl describe pod wordpress-5445bc4985-bskbj`.
3. Check logs: `kubectl logs wordpress-5445bc4985-bskbj`.
4. Resolve any errors found.
